Combat
Hit Points: 86 Initiative: 7 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 3

Armor: Breastplate Shield: None Weapons: Javelin (+7 1d6+1 R30/120); Light Crossbow (+8 1d8+2 R80/320); Sling (+8 1d4+2 R30/120); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +2
Explosive Cannon: Eldritch Cannon inflicts +1d8 HP damage
Extra Attack: +2 Attacks Per Round
Improved Defender: +2d6 Arcane Jolt effect/Steel Defender gains +2 Armor Class
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Alert: Cannot be surprised/Unseen foes gain no Adv on attacks on self
Arcane Armor: Self armor has no Strength requirement, covers entire body, replaces missing limbs, and can be put on or taken off in 1 action
Arcane Jolt: Magic weapon or Steel Defender attack inflicts +4d6 HP force or heals 4d6 HP to 1 target in a 30' radius 3/long rest
Battle Ready: +2 (Intelligence instead of Strength) or +1 (Intelligence instead of Dexterity) attack and damage w/magic weapons
Defensive Field: May use a bonus action to gain 20 temporary HP 6/long rest
Eldritch Cannon: May create a magical cannon (AC 18, 100 HP (Mending repairs 2d6 HP), MV 15') flamethrower (15' cone inflicts 3d8 HP fire (DC 17 Dexterity half)), force ballista (R120' inflicts 3d8 force and pushes 5'), or protector (R10' targets gain 1d8+3 temporary HP) for 1 hr 1/long rest (may spend a spell slot for additional)
Explosive Cannon: R60' May destroy eldritch cannon to inflict 3d8 HP force (DC 17 Dexterity half) in a 20' radius
Fortified Position: May have 2 Eldritch Cannons simultaneously/Eldritch Cannon gives allies half cover in 10' radius
Improved Defender: Steel Defender Deflect Attack inflicts 1d4+3 HP force
Lightning Launcher: Range 90/300 attack inflicts 1d6 HP lightning, +1d6 HP lightning 1/rd
Perfected Armor (Guardian Armor): R30' May use Reaction to pull a creature up to 30' (DC 17 Strength neg) and attack if w/in 5' afterward 6/long rest
Perfected Armor (Infiltrator Armor): Lightning Launcher inflicts Disadv on attacks on self, and next attack on target gains Adv and inflicts +1d6 HP lightning, for 1 rd
Soul Of Artifice: May use Reaction and end 1 infusion when reduced to 0 HP to retain 1 HP
Steel Defender: May create a mechanical companion (AC 17; HP 105 (Mending repairs 2d6 HP, self-repair 2d8+6 HP 3/dy); Attack +9 inflicts 1d8+6 HP force; may use Reaction for R5' inflict Disadv on attack; MV 40'; Dexterity Save +7; Constitution Save +8; immune to poison and charmed, exhausted, poisoned, and surprised conditions)
Thunder Gauntlets: Each gauntlet inflicts 1d8 HP thunder and Disadv on attacks on others for 1 rd

Chemical Mastery: Resistance to acid and poison damage/Immune to poisoned condition
Fey Ancestry: Adv on saves vs. charm/Immune to magical sleep

Magic
Spell Slots: A0: 4; A1: 4; A2: 3; A3: 3; A4: 3; A5: 2; D0: 2; D1: 1 Attack: A: 9; D: 10 Spell DC: A: 17; D: 18
Spells:
Aura Of Purity (A4 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and Adv on saves vs. conditions for conc up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (A3 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): R30' Self may use a bonus action to restore 2d6 HP to target 1/rd for conc up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (A5 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for conc up to 1 min if foe is reduced to 50 HP
Blight (A4 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Constitution half; plant target suffers Disadv and maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Branding Smite (A2 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights target for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Cloudkill (A5 [Alchemist Spells] Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Constitution half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (A5 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Conjure Barrage (A3 [Battle Smith Spells] Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type (Dexterity half)
Death Ward (A4 [Alchemist Spells] Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Fire Shield (A4 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fire Shield (A4 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): Self gains resistance to heat or cold damage, and a successful adjacent attacker suffers 2d8 HP fire or cold for 10 min
Fireball (A3 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R150' 20' radius inflicts 8d6 HP fire (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Flaming Sphere (A2 [Alchemist Spells] Conj): R60' 5' sphere lights a 20' radius, inflicts 2d6 HP fire (Dexterity half), ignites unattended flammable objects, and moves 30'/rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Gaseous Form (A3 [Alchemist Spells] Tran): Touched creature becomes gaseous for conc up to 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (A4 [Armorer Spells] Illu): Touched becomes invisible for conc up to 1 min
Greater Restoration (A5 [Chemical Mastery] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, or cursed or regains ability or HP maximum
Heal (A6 [Chemical Mastery] Evoc): R60' Target regains 70 HP and recovers from blinded, deafened, and diseased [+Level restores +10 HP]
Healing Word (A1 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+3 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Heroism (A1 [Battle Smith Spells] Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +3 temporary HP each rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hypnotic Pattern (A3 [Armorer Spells] Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become charmed (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Ice Storm (A4 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Lesser Restoration (A2 [Restorative Reagents] Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Lightning Bolt (A3 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): 100'x5' line inflicts 8d6 HP lightning (Dexterity half) and ignites unattended flammable objects [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Magic Missile (A1 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Mass Cure Wounds (A5 [Battle Smith Spells] Evoc): R60' 6 targets in a 30' radius regain 3d8+3 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Mass Healing Word (A3 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R60' 6 targets regain 1d4+3 HP [+Level restores +1d4 HP]
Melf's Acid Arrow (A2 [Alchemist Spells] Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 4d4 HP acid, plus 2d4 HP next rd (miss half 1st rd only) [+Level inflicts +1d4 HP]
Mirror Image (A2 [Armorer Spells] Illu): 3 duplicates (AC 12; damage destroys) misdirect attacks on self for 1 min
Passwall (A5 [Armorer Spells] Tran): R30' Creates a 5'x8'x20' passage through wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr
Raise Dead (A5 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): Restores life to and removes diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse
Ray Of Sickness (A1 [Alchemist Spells] Necr): R60' Ranged spell inflicts 2d8 HP poison and poisoned 1 rd (Constitution HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Scorching Ray (A2 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Shatter (A2 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shatter (A2 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Shield (A1 [Artillerist Spells] Abju): May cast as a Reaction to gain +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until next turn
Shield (A1 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): May cast as a Reaction to gain +5 AC and immunity to Magic Missile until next turn
Thunderwave (A1 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Thunderwave (A1 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): 15' cube inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Fire (A4 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' 60'x20'x1' wall inflicts 5d8 HP fire (Dexterity half) w/in 10' of chosen side for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Wall Of Force (A5 [Armorer Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for conc up to 10 min
Wall Of Force (A5 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' Creates 10 10'x10' impassable force panels for conc up to 10 min
Warding Bond (A2 [Battle Smith Spells] Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and self also suffers any damage to touched, for 1 hr
Wind Wall (A3 [Artillerist Spells] Evoc): R120' 50'x15'x1' area inflicts 3d8 HP bludgeoning (Strength half) and deflects lightweight creatures and objects for conc up to 1 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Druid): Knows 2 D0 spells/May cast chosen D1 spell 1/long rest
Magic Item Master: May attune 6 items simultaneously
Magic Item Savant: May attune 5 items simultaneously
Alchemical Savant: Spells cast using alchemical supplies gain +3 HP healing or acid, fire, necrotic, or poison damage
Arcane Firearm: Spells cast through a prepared wand, staff, or rod inflict +1d8 HP damage
Arcane Propulsion Armor: Infused armor gives +5' Speed and replaces missing limbs; range 20/60 magical gauntlets inflict 1d8 HP force and return
Armor Modifications: May apply 4 infusions to armor pieces
Armor Of Magical Strength: Wearer of infused armor w/6 charges may spend 1 charge to gain +Intelligence Modifier Strength check or save or to use Reaction to avoid being knocked prone; armor regains 1d6 charges each dawn
Boots Of The Winding Path: Wearer of infused boots may teleport back to a space w/in 15'
Chemical Mastery: May use alchemist's supplies to cast Greater Restoration and Heal 1/long rest
Elemental Adept (Cold): Cold spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Enhanced Arcane Focus: Infused rod, staff, or wand gives +2 spell attacks that ignore half cover
Enhanced Defense: Infused armor or shield gives +2 AC
Enhanced Weapon: Infused weapon gives +2 attack and damage
Experimental Elixir: May use alchemist's supplies after a long rest to create 3 elixirs of healing, swiftness, resilience, boldness, flight, or transformation; may spend spell slots to create additional elixirs
Helm Of Awareness: Infused helmet gives Adv on Initiative, and wearer cannot be surprised
Homunculus Servant: May create a mechanical companion (AC 13; HP 24; Attack R30' +9 inflicts 1d4+6 HP force; Evasion; Channel Magic)
Infuse Item: May infuse 8 items simultaneously
Magic Item Adept: May attune 6 items simultaneously/May craft uncommon magic items in one quarter time at half cost
Magic Item Savant: May ignore attunement and use requirements on attuned items
Magical Tinkering: May imbue 3 objects simultaneously with light, message, sound, odor, or picture
Mind Sharpener: Infused armor or robes w/4 charges allows wearer to use Reaction and 1 charge to change a failed Constitution save for spell concentration to success; item regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Radiant Weapon: Infused weapon w/4 charges gives +1 attack and damage and emits a 30' bright light on command; wielder may use Reaction and 1 charge to blind a successful attacker (DC 17 Constitution neg) for 1 rd; item regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Repeating Shot: Infused ammunition weapon gives +1 attack and damage and automatically creates its own ammunition
Replicate Magic Item: Allows replication of a wondrous item
Repulsion Shield: Infused shield w/4 charges gives +1 AC; holder may use Reaction and 1 charge to push a successful attacker 15'; regains 1d4 charges each dawn
Resistant Armor: Infused armor gives +1 AC and resistance to chosen damage type
Restorative Reagents: May use alchemist's supplies to cast Lesser Restoration 3/long rest/Elixirs give 2d6+3 temporary HP
Returning Weapon: Infused thrown weapon gives +1 attack and damage and returns after being thrown
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
